resources.string: Are you experiencing a smartphone overload?
Why do you want to exchange this challenge?
How strongly do you agree with the following statements?
Thank you for completing the challenge!
The challenge helped me improve my life-technology balance.
The challenge increased my real world awareness.
I felt bored while doing the challenge.
I feel happy after doing the challenge.
I feel annoyed after doing the challenge.
The challenge helped me improve my wellbeing.
The challenge helped me to balance real and digital activities.
Compared to before doing the challenge, my life-technology balance feels the same.
Select which category it belongs to
If you are currently experiencing smartphone overload, please press the button below.
I do not have enough time
I do not feel like completing it
The challenge is too difficult to execute
My current circumstances do not allow it
Do you want to cancel this challenge?
I want to always hide this challenge
I did not experience a smartphone overload
Why do you want to cancel this challenge?
RealWorldWind needs access to usage statistics to analyze which apps lead to smartphone overload. Please press the button to proceed to Settings, in order to give RealWorldWind the permission.
For how many minutes would you like to snooze?

Please use the StudyID from the questionnaire consisting of 6 digits XXYYZZ with: 

• XX: first two letters of your birthplace
• YY: the days of your birthday
• ZZ: first two letters of the street you live at
•XX are the first two letters of your birthplace.
•YY are the days of your birthday.
•ZZ are the first two letters of the street you live at.
What context were you in when the smartphone overload was detected?
Please restart the App to have it working.
Seems that the app was either stopped by the System or a connection to the database could not be established.
